textos_fuente.text: Our Team – Angler Construction Skip to content Toggle Navigation About Us Our Story Our Team Our Culture Services Services Delivery Methods Safety Our Work Design/Build Vertical Corporate Interiors Retail Banking ALL News Contact Us Contact Us Careers Our Team THE ANGLER CONSTRUCTION TEAM At Angler Construction our team members are the backbone of our corporate success. Our team has created a company culture based on positivity, respect, and teamwork. It is these ingredients that make our incredible team unstoppable. ACCOMPLISHMENTS 0 of retail projects 0 of industrial/office projects 0 in TI/corporate finish out projects 0 of ground-up construction OPERATIONS TEAM Torrey Hawkins President / Founder 1339 Read More × Torrey Hawkins President / Founder thawkins@anglerco.com 713.898.5575 Torrey Hawkins is President and Founder of Angler Construction. Torrey graduated from the University of Alabama with a Bachelor of Science in Marketing. He established Angler in 2010 and has since led its remarkable growth journey. Under his leadership, Angler has flourished into a team of over 45 members and achieving corporate growth from $2 million to an impressive $155 million in just 13 years. Torrey’s entrepreneurial spirit and strategic awareness have been instrumental in Angler's success, solidifying its reputation as a leading player in the construction industry. Favorite Astros Player: Kyle Tucker Best fish ever caught: 28lb permit in the Bahamas on 40th Birthday First Job: Golf Caddy NOTABLE PROJECTS Jason Atherton Vice President of Construction Operations 1744 Read More × Jason Atherton Vice President of Construction Operations jatherton@anglerco.com Jason Atherton has over 20 years of Industrial Construction expertise. In his role, he monitors the production and quality of all work undertaken by Angler, ensuring the highest standards are met. Beyond this, Jason spearheads the development and management of the operations team, fostering a culture of excellence and innovation. Jason actively contributes to the industry's growth as a member of the Lamar Construction Management Advisory Board, the UH College of Business Advisory Board, and the Economic Alliance Port Houston Region. Bucket List Item: Costa Rica Favorite Astros Player: Alan Ashby Favorite Quote: “Don’t start no trouble, won’t be no trouble” NOTABLE PROJECTS Michael Reed Director of Angler Sitework 1781 Read More × Michael Reed Director of Angler Sitework mreed@anglerco.com Michael Reed is Director of Angler Sitework, whose expertise encompasses a disciplined approach to Earthwork, Roofing, and Plumbing trades. With a keen eye for detail and a deep understanding of these critical construction elements, Michael plays a key role in ensuring the successful implementation and coordination of sitework projects at Angler. Favorite Hobby: Restoring fishing boats Favorite Angler Event: Holiday Toy Drive NOTABLE PROJECTS Fred Rose Director of Corporate Interiors Construction 1784 Read More × Fred Rose Director of Corporate Interiors Construction frose@anglerco.com With an impressive 35 years of industry experience, Fred Rose has become a leader within Angler Construction. Fred joined Angler in 2017 as a Project Manager and worked his way to the role of Director of Corporate Interiors Construction. In this capacity, he not only oversees the Corporate Interiors Division but also leads the Angler Interior Systems Team, exemplifying his leadership and profound impact on the company's interior construction projects. Favorite Hobby: Bicycling & table tennis Pick to Play Himself in a Movie: Ron White Favorite Angler Event: Casino Night Christmas Party NOTABLE PROJECTS Buckley Baseball Square Footage | 25,000 SF Crawford Houston Square Footage | 47,000 SF TGC Sushi Square Footage | 23,000 SF Devin Valenta Director of Vertical Construction 1787 Read More × Devin Valenta Director of Vertical Construction dvalenta@anglerco.com Devin Valenta is a dynamic construction professional with a Bachelor of Science in Construction Management Technology from Oklahoma State University. With expertise in both educational construction and U.S. Army Corps of Engineers projects, Devin joined Angler in 2018, quickly ascending the ranks to become the Director of Vertical Construction. As the Project Manager for Angler's largest vertical project, Port 99, Devin has played a pivotal role in its success. His impressive track record includes overseeing the construction of 4.2 million square feet, highlighting his leadership and impact within Angler's Vertical Construction Division. Bucket List Item: Visit all MLB Ballparks Favorite Hobby: Woodworking NOTABLE PROJECTS Port 99 Square Footage | 1,300,000 SF True Port Square Footage | 255,000 SF Tyndale Expansion Square Footage | 46,000 SF Adam Hissong Senior Project Manager, Vertical Construction 1790 Read More × Adam Hissong Senior Project Manager, Vertical Construction ahissong@anglerco.com Adam Hissong holds a Bachelor of Science degree in Construction Management Technology from Pittsburg State University. With a solid foundation in educational construction and U.S. Army Corps of Engineers projects, Adam’s professional journey with Angler began in 2018 when he joined as an Assistant Project Manager. Demonstrating exceptional skills and dedication, he quickly climbed the ranks, earning promotion to Senior Project Manager. Currently, he serves as the Project Manager overseeing Angler's largest design-build project, Packwell. Bucket List Item: Sport Fishing in Costa Rica First Job: Butcher at Meat Market NOTABLE PROJECTS Packwell Square Footage | 724,000 SF Worldwide Power Products Square Footage | 40,000 SF Port 225 Commerce Center Square Footage | 484,000 SF Kyle Henderson Project Manager, Vertical Construction 1793 Read More × Kyle Henderson Project Manager, Vertical Construction khenderson@anglerco.com Kyle Henderson graduated from Texas A&M University with a degree in Industrial Distribution. He joined Angler in 2017, starting as an Assistant Project Manager in the Corporate Interiors Division and has since ascended to the role of Project Manager in the Vertical Construction Division. Currently, Kyle oversees the Corpus Christi and San Antonio Divisions of Angler Construction. Favorite Hobby: Bird hunting, saltwater fishing, cooking Favorite Angler Event: Angler Invitational Fishing Tournament – Does all the cooking for the event NOTABLE PROJECTS APEX CORPUS CHRISTI Square Footage | 20,000 SF REGIONS SAN ANTONIO Square Footage | 2,400 SF Chad Forman Project Manager, Vertical Construction 2470 Read More × Chad Forman Project Manager, Vertical Construction Cforman@anglerco.com Chad Forman earned his Bachelor of Administration in Finance from Texas Tech University. He joined Angler as a Project Manager for the Vertical Construction team, bringing over two decades of industry expertise, primarily in corporate interiors and business development. Bucket List Item: Going to The Masters with my Dad and Brother Best Fish Caught/Animal Killed: “Most Fun”: Caught a 35” Jack on light tackle in the surf NOTABLE PROJECTS Packwell Square Footage | 724,000 SF True Port Square Footage | 255,000 SF Will English Project Manager, Vertical Construction 2756 Read More × Will English Project Manager, Vertical Construction wenglish@anglerco.com Will English is the newest member of our Vertical Construction Team. He received his B.S. in Landscape Architecture from Texas A&M University (WHOOP!) and has built an impressive resume of over a decade of experience & knowledge in the construction industry. Favorite Astros Player: All time - Craig Biggio, Current - Jose Altuve Favorite Hobby: Grilling & Smoking Outdoors First Job: Working on the Family Rice Farm NOTABLE PROJECTS Ley Road Logistics Center Square Footage | 408,000 SF TRANS-GLOBAL SOLUTIONS DISTRIBUTION CENTER 9 Square Footage | 420,000 SF Marc Brereton Project Manager, Vertical Construction 1943 Read More × Marc Brereton Project Manager, Vertical Construction mbereton@anglerco.com Marc Brereton holds a Bachelor of Science degree in Mechanical Engineering from Florida International University. Marc transitioned to Angler in 2022 after working in Oil & Gas Construction. Currently, he plays a pivotal role overseeing Angler’s Industrial and Retail projects. Favorite Soccer Team: Arsenal FC Favorite Quote: “When in doubt, flat out” – Colin McCrae NOTABLE PROJECTS Bluefish Pediatrics Square Footage | 23,000 SF WestPoint 45 Square Footage | 728,000 SF JASCOLE DISTRIBUTION CENTER Square Footage | 65,000 SF Alex Aitken Project Manager, Vertical Construction 1946 Read More × Alex Aitken Project Manager, Vertical Construction aaitken@anglerco.com Alex Aitken graduated from Texas A&M with a degree in Construction Science and embarked on his professional journey with Angler Construction immediately upon graduation. Beginning as a Project Engineer, Alex’s dedication and expertise led to a well-deserved promotion to Project Manager. Favorite Angler Event: Angler Invitational Fishing Tournament NOTABLE PROJECTS Tyndale Expansion Square Footage | 46,000 SF Tyndale Deer Park Square Footage | 7,500 SF McKAY INDUSTRIAL BUILDING Square Footage | 171,000 SF Kevin Black Assistant Project Manager, Vertical Construction 1949 Read More × Kevin Black Assistant Project Manager, Vertical Construction kblack@anglerco.com Kevin Black graduated from Sam Houston State University with a degree in Construction Management, bringing a fresh perspective and a strong foundation to the construction industry. Having gained valuable insights through internships in both residential construction and wastewater facilities construction, Kevin joined Angler in 2023 as an Assistant Project Manager and is now the newest member of the Angler Vertical Construction Team. Bucket List Item: Africa Safari Hunt Favorite Hobby: Hiking with wife and dog NOTABLE PROJECTS Hunt Rd Storage Facility Square Footage | 105,000 SF Port 225 Commerce Center Square Footage | 484,000 SF SOUTH SHAVER – BROADWAY Square Footage | 159,000 SF Joe Wilkins Assistant Project Manager, Angler Sitework 2761 Read More × Joe Wilkins Assistant Project Manager, Angler Sitework jwilkins@anglerco.com Joe Wilkins did a semester long internship with Angler Sitework in 2023, after graduating from Texas A&M in 2024 with his B.S in Construction Science he returned to Angler as an Assistant Project Manager. Joe is a member of the Angler Sitework Team, specializing in site demolition, earthwork, and utilities. Favorite Angler Event: Angler Invitational Fishing Tournament Best fish ever caught: 72lb Wahoo NOTABLE PROJECTS Daniela Parra Project Coordinator, Vertical Construction 1953 Read More × Daniela Parra Project Coordinator, Vertical Construction dparra@anglerco.com Daniela Parra initially joined Angler as a receptionist, where her exceptional skills propelled her to the role of Project Coordinator, making her the newest member of Angler's Vertical Construction Division team. Her ability to seamlessly integrate into the Vertical Construction Division and her contribution to Angler's diverse projects has been valuable to the Angler team. Favorite Quote: “Your patience is your power.” Favorite Part of Your Job: I would have to say that my favorite part about my job is we have a great team built as well as the learning/growth opportunities we are given. NOTABLE PROJECTS Carlos Gonzalez Project Manager, Corporate Interiors 1954 Read More × Carlos Gonzalez Project Manager, Corporate Interiors cgonzalez@anglerco.com Carlos Gonzalez earned his Associate of Applied Science in Automotive Technology from San Jacinto College, where he also took a number of Real Estate Development courses. Carlos’ journey in the construction industry began with a focus on residential development, where he cultivated a deep understanding of the intricacies of project management. Joining Angler in 2019 as a Superintendent, Carlos' worth ethic quickly led to his promotion to Project Manager within the Corporate Interiors Division. Favorite Hobby: Working in his vegetable garden with his son Favorite Angler Event: Astros Baseball Game NOTABLE PROJECTS Brett Dishman Project Manager, Corporate Interiors 1957 Read More × Brett Dishman Project Manager, Corporate Interiors bdishman@anglerco.com Brett Dishman, armed with a Bachelor of Science in Commerce and Business Administration from the University of Alabama, came to Angler with a robust background as a Commercial Broker, accumulating five years of industry experience. In 2021, Brett joined the Angler team as an Assistant Project Manager within the Corporate Interiors Division, he has since been promoted to Project Manager. Favorite Snow Cone Flavor: Watermelon Favorite Quote: “When a defining moment comes along, you can do one of two things. Define the moment, or let the moment define you.” – Roy McAvoy in Tin Cup Favorite Hobby: Saltwater fishing in Lower Laguna NOTABLE PROJECTS Port 99 TI Square Footage | 6,400 SF Cedar Port Distribution Center 4 Square Footage | 8,200 SF Milestone Environmental Square Footage | 24,000 SF Martin Torres Project Manager, Angler Interior Systems 1960 Read More × Martin Torres Project Manager, Angler Interior Systems mtorres@anglerco.com Martin Torres has over 20 years of invaluable experience in the construction industry. Joining Angler in 2020 as a Superintendent, his exceptional skills and leadership qualities earned him a promotion to Project Manager for Angler Interior Systems (AIS). Favorite Hobby: Riding on his motorcycle Favorite Angler Event: Fairhaven Food Pantry NOTABLE PROJECTS Jill Castillo Senior Project Coordinator, Corporate Interiors & Angler Interior Systems 1990 Read More × Jill Castillo Senior Project Coordinator, Corporate Interiors & Angler Interior Systems jcastillo@anglerco.com Jill Castillo has an impressive 13 years of experience as an Industrial Project Coordinator. Her extensive expertise has equipped her with a deep understanding of the intricacies involved in coordinating large-scale corporate interior projects. Bucket List Item: Tour Italy Favorite Hobby: Painting NOTABLE PROJECTS 1704 Townhurst Dr Houston, TX 77043 713.629.5860 ©2025 Angler Construction. All Rights Reserved. Click HERE for Details Save 10% on your first order! Click HERE to become an email subscriber! Search Lee Gould Lee is an avid walleye angler. He fishes all over the great lakes region. One day he is on Lake St. Clair, the next day he may be fishing Ohio waters of Lake Erie. Lee does a great job sharing information to help other anglers be successful on the water. Lee also fishes walleye tournaments and endorses our great sport every chance he gets. CADDY SYSTEM ON BOARD 2 Caddy Standard Track Mount Tyler Logsdon Tyler is a licensed Kentucky guide who loves to chase giant slab crappie! He also spends a lot of time on Lake Erie chasing walleye! He keeps his Starcraft Fishmaster busy and on the water as much as possible. He has a great passion for the sport and works hard to catch fish. CADDY SYSTEM ON BOARD 4 Caddy Standard Track Mount Jim Todson Jim is an avid walleye angler. He spends a lot of time on the Detroit River  during the spring walleye run. Once the jigging season slows down, he moves on to trolling Michigan waters of Lake Erie. As summer moves on, he lays the smack down on Lake Erie perch! Private Events - Angler's Beachside Bar & Grill Toggle navigation Home Menu Sports Bar Weddings/Private Events Contact Private Events Welcome to Angler's Beachside Grill!  Anglers is a 15,000+ square foot restaurant, located on the sandy white beaches of Okaloosa Island, Fort Walton Beach, Florida. At Angler's, we have a 5,000+ square foot, top floor private venue that overlooks the emerald waters of the Gulf Coast of Mexico. The space easily accommodates up to 196 guests, is elevator accessible, and has a private staircase. Within the center of the venue, we have an inviting 50+ person island bar. Guests will also have access to a changing room and private bathrooms. Our team works closely with you to create customized menus for your event: we have a build-your-own, buffet style menu, which offers salads, appetizers, and surf n' turf options. We offer a variety of drink packages that range from an open bar, cash bar, or a bar with a limit. Specialty drinks options are also available, including a Mimosa and Margarita Bar. Additional options are available, such as discounts on local hotel room packages for your guests, floral arrangements, audio-visual services, decorations, and more to help you craft the perfect event for this special day for you and your guests. If you have any general questions, please feel free to contact us at: (850) 796-0260 If you have any questions related to private events and bookings, please feel free to contact us at: (850) 739-1109 events@anglersgrill.com Receptions & Beach Weddings If your wedding dream is to walk barefoot down a sugar white sand isle with a backdrop of glittering emerald waters and brilliant blue skies, we have got the perfect place for your special day. Angler’s Beachside Grill is pleased to offer you complete beachfront wedding packages, along with an option for a beachside reception. The restaurant has a top-floor private, farmhouse style venue that overlooks the emerald waters of the Gulf Coast of Mexico. The sugary white sand allows you to have a picture-perfect beach wedding, followed by the reception of your dreams only steps away. Do not stress out about planning your Dream Day. We will do all of that for you. Let Angler's Beachside Grill help you with planning your perfect beach wedding in Fort Walton Beach, Florida. For more information or to plan your dream wedding contact us at: (850) 739-1109 events@anglersgrill.com Copyright © 2025 Angler's Beachside Grill Hours Monday - Thursday 11:00 AM - 9:00 PM Friday 11:00 AM - 10:00 PM Saturday 8:00 AM - 10:00 PM Sunday 10:00 AM - 9:00 PM Sunday Brunch 10:00 AM - 2:00 PM Address 1030 Miracle Strip Parkway Okaloosa Island Pier Fort Walton beach, Florida 32548 Phone: 850-796-0260

About Us - Angler's Events (850)-739-1109 events@anglersgrill.com Facebook Instagram RSS Facebook Instagram RSS Home About Us Location 3D Virtual Tour Angler’s Team Accomodation Airport Wedding Packages Special Events FAQ s Testimonials Portfolio Contact Select Page Welcome to the home of Angler’s Events! Angler’s Beachside Grill is nestled along the stunning coastline of the Gulf of America, located on Okaloosa Island in Fort Walton Beach, Florida. Situated directly on the beachfront, this restaurant offers panoramic views of the emerald waters and sugar-white sands that stretch as far as the eye can see. Discover the romance and charm at our farmhouse-style wedding venue which is just minutes away from the vibrant towns of Destin, Santa Rosa (30-A) and Fort Walton Beach. Our picturesque location offers an amazing backdrop for your dream beach wedding. VIEW THE VIRTUAL TOUR Angler’s Team At Anglers, we have an experienced team of event planners, coordinators, decorators, servers, and bartenders who are all dedicated to providing you with exceptional services for your wedding or event! For the brides, our wedding team understands that your special day is one of the most important occasions of your life, and we’re passionate about making it everything you’ve ever dreamed of. Our professionals have a deep understanding of weddings and events, spanning from the tiniest details to the grandest visions. We approach every project with care and precision, taking the time to listen to your needs and ideas, and working tirelessly to bring them to life. With unparalleled design, planning, coordination, and execution, we’ll transform your wedding or event into a truly unforgettable experience. Whatever your vision, style, or budget may be, we’re here to ensure that your celebration meets all of your expectations. Thank you for considering us for your special day – we can’t wait to bring your vision to life! I'm ready to make my day memorable! Location Discover the romance and charm at our farmhouse-style wedding venue located on the sugary sand beaches of Okaloosa Island, Florida. Nestled steps away from the emerald coast waters of the Gulf Coast of America and the Island Pier, our venue is just minutes away from the vibrant towns of Destin, Santa Rosa (30-A) and Fort Walton Beach. Our picturesque location offers an amazing backdrop for your dream beach wedding. Accommodations We understand that planning a wedding can be stressful, and finding the perfect place to host your guests can be even more daunting. From luxurious beachfront hotels to delightful and cozy condos, Okaloosa Island offers a range of options to cater to the diverse needs of your guests. Accommodations are conveniently located near our wedding venue, so that guests can easily travel to and from your event without any hassle. Let us be your guide to the perfect wedding experience – we’re here to ensure that your wedding is an unforgettable and seamless celebration for everyone involved. Things To Do 1. Okaloosa Island Pier! Make Your Beach Wedding Extra Special at Okaloosa Island Pier! Connected right to Angler’s Beachside Grill, Okaloosa Island Pier is the perfect spot for your guests to have a little fun before the ceremony on the beach. Imagine your favorite people showing up a little early, sipping on delicious drinks from our outdoor Tiki Bar, and leisurely strolling along the pier with a refreshing beverage in hand, soaking in the sights of the sea life and the blissful weather. With a small entry fee granting access for the entire day, your guests can enjoy the pier’s charm at their own pace. Okaloosa Pier is a photographer’s dream for capturing those magical wedding moments. With its stunning variety of backdrops, every photo promises to be as unique and special as the couple in it. The pier itself, with its rustic charm and the rhythmic sound of waves beneath, adds a timeless elegance to your images. Plus, think about wrapping up your big day with everyone lighting sparklers on the pier – talk about a memorable moment! 2. Wild Willy’s Adventure Zone Wild Willy’s Adventure Zone is located right across the road from Angler’s Beachside Grill. It is a premier family entertainment destination that offers many attractions and activities for visitors of all ages. From adrenaline-pumping rides to classic arcade games, Wild Willy’s promises an unforgettable experience filled with fun and excitement. Test your bravery on the Treetop Challenge ropes course, navigating through obstacles high above the ground. For those seeking a more grounded adventure, the 4D XD Movie Experience offers immersive cinematic thrills that engage all the senses. Families can also enjoy a round of mini-golf on the tropical-themed course, complete with lush landscaping and whimsical obstacles. Wild Willy’s Adventure Zone is not just about outdoor fun – it also boasts an extensive arcade featuring a wide selection of classic and modern games. From timeless favorites like skee-ball and air hockey to cutting-edge video games and redemption games, there’s something for every gamer to enjoy. Guests can collect tickets and redeem them for prizes, adding an extra element of excitement to their arcade experience.  https://wwazone.com/  1306 Miracle Strip Pkwy, SE Fort Walton Beach, FL 32548 3. Gulfarium Keep the Celebration Going with a Trip to the Gulfarium! Got extra time around your wedding day? Check out the Gulfarium next door. It’s an amazing spot to explore sea life wonders. Your wedding week just got even more exciting! This premier marine park offers a diverse array of experiences for people of all ages. You can see amazing animals up close, enjoy exciting live shows, and more. Watch smart dolphins do incredible tricks, or see sea lions being their cute, funny selves.
